errors.auth/wrong-password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
errors.auth/too-many-requests: We have blocked all requests from this device due to unusual activity. Try again later.
errors.auth/user-not-found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
